Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Oatlands Park Hotel in Weybridge, you'll be next to a golf course and convenient to Elmbridge Museum and Brooklands Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of London Bus Museum and Burhill Golf Club.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 144 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor tennis court and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Weybridge? This hotel has facilities measuring 4058 square feet (377 square meters), including meeting rooms. Guests may use a train station pick-up service for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Oatlands Park Hotel in Weybridge, you'll be next to a golf course and convenient to Elmbridge Museum and Brooklands Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of London Bus Museum and Burhill Golf Club.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Elmbridge Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Brooklands Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
London Bus Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Burhill Golf Club - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Chertsey Abbey - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Mercedes-Benz World - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Silvermere Golf Complex - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Claremont Landscape Garden - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Painshill Park - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Chertsey Museum - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Kempton Racecourse - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Sandown Park - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Thorpe Park - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
The Medicine Garden - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
West Byfleet Golf Club - 6.5 km / 4 mi

The preferred airport for Oatlands Park Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow) - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
